body:
Comment 1: 
I've attached a more comprehensive test for test/fixedbugs/issue5162.go.

Direct compares okay, but stuffing them into interface values fails?

At least one of the bugs is currently fixed at tip, but maybe only on 6g.

Current output:

fail in CheckEq5_Int: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_IntExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Int8: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Int8ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Int16: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Int16ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Int32: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Int32ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Int64: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Int64ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_UintExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint8: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint8ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint16: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint16ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint32: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint32ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint64: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Uint64ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Float32: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Float32ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Float64: false true true
fail in CheckEq5_Float64ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq6_Int: false true true
fail in CheckEq6_IntExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq6_Int8: false true true
fail in CheckEq6_Int8ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq6_Int16: false true true
fail in CheckEq6_Int16ExtraVar: false true true
fail in CheckEq6_Int32: false true true
fail in CheckEq6_Int32ExtraVar: false true true
... up to 32.

<= 4 works.
_Labels changed: added **priority-asap**, **go1.1**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._ Attachments: 1. issue5162.go (526095 bytes)
